content.en: Advanced Flow Simulations: Researchers at Inria Sophia Antipolis, Athena, HiPPSTR, PETSc libraries, CaNS, and other institutions are exploring various algorithms to address complex flow simulations, simulating flow in porous media, large eddy simulation, particle-laden flow simulations, petascale turbulence simulations, and more. These algorithms aim to achieve efficient and robust solvers, high performance computation, scalability, and accuracy in simulating turbulent flows. The research focuses on developing parallel, high-order, overset-grid methods, direct numerical solution procedures, finite element schemes, lattice Boltzmann methods, and other techniques for computational fluid dynamics.
content.da: Avancerede strømningssimuleringer: Forskere ved Inria Sophia Antipolis, Athena, HiPPSTR, PETSc-bibliotekerne, CaNS og andre institutioner udforsker forskellige algoritmer for at håndtere komplekse strømningssimuleringer, herunder simulering af strøm i porøse medier, store virvelsimuleringer, partikelbelastede strømningssimuleringer, petaskala-turbulenssimuleringer og mere. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at opnå effektive og robuste løsere, høj ydeevneberegning, skalerbarhed og nøjagtighed i simuleringen af turbulente strømme. Forskningen fokuserer på at udvikle parallelle, højordensmetoder, overlappende gittermetoder, direkte numeriske løsningsprocedurer, finite element-skemaer, gitter Boltzmann-metoder og andre teknikker til beregningsfluiddynamik.
